price: Nayo hakika ni Uwongofu na Rehema kwa Waumini.
footnotes: Hakika Kitabu hichi ni Uwongofu wa kuokoa watu wasipotee, na ni Rehema ya kuwakinga na adhabu wote wenye kukiamini.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
